full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN PADMA DBANG CHEN GYI SGO NAS DKAR NAG LAS 'BRAS DBYE BA SHO MO KHRA BO GSAL BA'I MNGON SHES ME LONG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO,, ,,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @022A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI RTA MGRIN PADMA DBANG CHEN GYI SGO NAS DKAR NAG LAS 'BRAS DBYE BA SHO MO KHRA BO GSAL BA'I MNGON SHES ME LONG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI MDOR BSDUS RTA MGRIN GYI RNAL 'BYOR PA BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYI BSKUL BA'I NGOR ^GSHIN RJE'I GSHED KYI RNAL 'BYOR PA RVA LO TZ'A BA PHAB TE RIGS LDAN SBYAR BA'O,,)
